mapper.select: SELECT id, cover, content, title, is_top as isTop, status, labels, category_id as categoryId, author_id as authorId, abstract_content as abstractContent, read_count as readCount, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, created_by as createdBy, updated_by as updatedBy FROM article WHERE id = #{id}
